item.title: EP 560 - McDonald's Mutants!
item.itunes:title: McDonald's Mutants!
item.description:
Today we look at disgusting fast food conspiracies!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Links:

McDonald's urban legends

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/McDonald%27s_urban_legends

Worm Meat Used in McDonald’s Hamburgers?

https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/worm-meat-used-mcdonalds-hamburgers/

McDonald's urban legends

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/McDonald%27s_urban_legends

McDonald's or McDonald's Hamburgers are made of genetically modified beings

http://www.quatrocantos.com/lendas/22_coisas_mcdonald.htm

Temple Grandin

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Temple_Grandin

Pro-lifers drop boycott after Pepsi disavows use of aborted fetal-cells

https://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2012/apr/30/pro-lifers-drop-pepsi-boycott/

Were Food Companies Caught Using Aborted Babies in Flavor Additives?

https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/senomyx-flavor-additive/

Pepsi's Bizarro World: Boycotted Over Embryonic Cells Linked to Lo-Cal Soda

https://www.cbsnews.com/news/pepsis-bizarro-world-boycotted-over-embryonic-cells-linked-to-lo-cal-soda/

Sickening: Major food corporations use tissue from aborted babies to manufacture flavor additives in processed foods

https://www.naturalnews.com/049367_aborted_babies_flavor_chemicals_food_corporations.html

Use of Aborted Fetal Tissue in Vaccines and Medical Research Obscures the Value of All Human Life

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6027112/
